sql.where:
is_delete = 0,
and dms_id = #{dmsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
and send_status = #{sendStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
and site_code = #{siteCode,jdbcType=BIGINT},
and box_code = #{boxCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select:

from container_relation
